name: Delusion (Unclesatan)
description:
Control the Cap’n as the old ones cause mental torment, inducing hallucinations and sending waves of horrors at you! Blast your trusty blunderbuss or swing the electrically charged sword to slay the horrors, restoring a semblance of your sanity.

Don’t let your sanity drop too low, as the hallucination effects will increase and suddenly you might just find yourself in the dark, or somewhere else entirely!
